questions.question: Do you think it is more important to have an enjoyable job or to make money? Explain your point of view.

answers.answer: I think the most important is to feel happy with your work, whatever your salary.
Why earn money if you feel miserable and depressed ?
In my opinion, that isn't the recipe of the happiness.
Money is just a sheet of paper with numbers onto it, it's just silly to think money is a goal. Money is just a tool which is important to build your project alone.
You don't need money if you've a lot of friends because your friends can helps you too.
If you want to earn a lot of money, you can try Monopoly with your friends.
You'll preserve your health, your good mood and your friend.
